entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to a few rain showers or periods of drizzle overnight. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
